text: Miroslav Tuđman (25 May 1946 – 31 January 2021) was a Croatian scientist and politician. He was born in Belgrade, then-Yugoslavia. He was a member of the Croatian Democratic Union. From 2011 until his death, he was a member of the Croatian Parliament. Tuđman died on 31 January 2021 in Zagreb, Croatia from COVID-19, aged 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Croatian scientists Category:Croatian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Croatia
title: Miroslav Tuđman
